com.mopub.mobileads

Interface MoPubRewardedVideoListener


  • public interface MoPubRewardedVideoListener
    Listener for rewarded video events. Implementers of this interface should be long-lived.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRewardedVideoClosed(java.lang.String adUnitId)
      Called when a rewarded video is closed.
      void onRewardedVideoCompleted(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> adUnitIds, MoPubReward reward)
      Called when a rewarded video is completed and the user should be rewarded.
      void onRewardedVideoLoadFailure(java.lang.String adUnitId, MoPubErrorCode errorCode)
      Called when a video fails to load for the given ad unit id.
      void onRewardedVideoLoadSuccess(java.lang.String adUnitId)
      Called when the adUnitId has loaded.
      void onRewardedVideoPlaybackError(java.lang.String adUnitId, MoPubErrorCode errorCode)
      Called when there is an error during video playback.
      void onRewardedVideoStarted(java.lang.String adUnitId)
      Called when a rewarded video starts playing.

    • Method Detail

      • onRewardedVideoLoadSuccess

        void onRewardedVideoLoadSuccess(java.lang.String adUnitId)
        Called when the adUnitId has loaded. At this point you should be able to call MoPub.showRewardedVideo(String) to show the video.

      • onRewardedVideoLoadFailure

        void onRewardedVideoLoadFailure(java.lang.String adUnitId,
                                MoPubErrorCode errorCode)
        Called when a video fails to load for the given ad unit id. The provided error code will give more insight into the reason for the failure to load.

      • onRewardedVideoStarted

        void onRewardedVideoStarted(java.lang.String adUnitId)
        Called when a rewarded video starts playing.

      • onRewardedVideoPlaybackError

        void onRewardedVideoPlaybackError(java.lang.String adUnitId,
                                  MoPubErrorCode errorCode)
        Called when there is an error during video playback.

      • onRewardedVideoClosed

        void onRewardedVideoClosed(java.lang.String adUnitId)
        Called when a rewarded video is closed. At this point your application should resume.

      • onRewardedVideoCompleted

        void onRewardedVideoCompleted(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> adUnitIds,
                              MoPubReward reward)
        Called when a rewarded video is completed and the user should be rewarded.
